alert.note: Alert for Cedar (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:09PM CDT until July 21 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cedar County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of St. Helena, or 9 miles east of Yankton, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... St. Helena around 720 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Wynot. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
